00015 // mouse move capture for IE
00016 var IE = document.all?true:false;
00017 if (!IE) document.captureEvents(Event.MOUSEMOVE)
00018 
00019 // UserControl:
00020 var UserControl = function(){};
00021 UserControl.prototype = {
00022 
00023   initialize: function( timer, graph, ui ) {
00024     this['timer'] = timer;
00025     this['graph'] = graph;
00026     this['ui'] = ui;
00027     this['lastSelectedNode']=-1;
00028     this['liveNode']=-1;
00029     var context=this;
00030 
00031     // append the mousemove eventhandler
00032     // FGraph control - use Wednus event system
00033     W.event(window, 'onresize', function( e ) {
00034       return(
00035         context.resizeFrame( e )
00036       )});
00037 
00038     /*
00039     window.onresize = function( e ) {
00040       return(
00041         context.resizeFrame( e )
00042       );
00043     };
00044     */
00045     
00046     
00047     // append the mousemove eventhandler
00048     document.onmousemove = function( e ) {
00049       return(
00050         context.moveSelected( e )
00051       );
00052     };
00053 
00054     // append the mouseup eventhandler
00055     document.onmouseup = function( e ) {
00056       return(
00057         context.unselectNode( e )
00058       );
00059     };
00060   },
00061 
00062   // resize the frame when the windo size changes
00063   resizeFrame: function( e ) {
00064     var FRAME_WIDTH;
00065     var FRAME_HEIGHT;
00066 
00067     if (IE) {
00068       FRAME_WIDTH = document.body.offsetWidth;
00069       FRAME_HEIGHT = document.body.offsetHeight;
00070     } else {
00071       FRAME_WIDTH = window.innerWidth;
00072       FRAME_HEIGHT = window.innerHeight;
00073     }
00074 
00075     FRAME_WIDTH -= (parseInt(document.getElementById('frame').style.left)*2);
00076     FRAME_HEIGHT -= (parseInt(document.getElementById('frame').style.top)+20);
00077 
00078     this.ui['frame_width']=FRAME_WIDTH;
00079     this.ui['frame_height']=FRAME_HEIGHT;
00080 
00081     this.graph['frame_width']=FRAME_WIDTH;
00082     this.graph['frame_height']=FRAME_HEIGHT;
00083 
00084     graph.origin.position['x'] = parseInt(this.graph['frame_width']/2);
00085     graph.origin.position['y'] = parseInt(this.graph['frame_height']/2);
00086 
00087     this.ui.drawOrigin( this.graph['origin'] );
00088   },
00089 
00090   // make this node 'selected' in the graph
00091   selectNode: function( e, node ) {
00092     if ( node == this['liveNode'] ) {
00093         this.unattach( e, this['liveNode'] );
00094     } else if ( this['liveNode'] != -1 ) {
00095       this.graph.addEdge( graph.getNode(this['liveNode']), graph.getNode(node), 48 );
00096     }
00097     this['graph'].setSelected( node );
00098   },
00099 
00100   focusNode: function( e, node ) {
00101     this['liveNode'] = node;
00102     graphui.setLive( graph.getNode(node) );
00103   },
00104 
00105   unattach: function( e, node ) {
00106     if ( this['liveNode'] != -1 ) {
00107       var at = this['liveNode'];
00108       graphui.unSetLive( graph.getNode(node) );
00109       this['liveNode'] = -1;
00110     }
00111   },
00112 
00113   // unselect this node in the graph
00114   unselectNode: function() {
00115     this['lastSelectedNode'] = this['graph'].getSelected();
00116     this['graph'].clearSelected();
00117   },
00118 
00119   // handle mouse movement when a node is selected
00120   moveSelected: function( e ) {
00121     if ( graph.hasSelected() ) {
00122       var selectedNode = graph.getSelected();
00123 
00124       var tempX;
00125       var tempY;
00126       // get the cursor position
00127       if (IE) {
00128         tempX = event.clientX + document.body.scrollLeft;
00129         tempY = event.clientY + document.body.scrollTop;
00130       } else {
00131         tempX = e.pageX;
00132         tempY = e.pageY;
00133       }
00134 
00135       tempX -= graphui.frame_left;
00136       tempY -= graphui.frame_top;
00137 
00138       // adjust for center
00139       tempX -= parseInt( this.ui.getNode( selectedNode ).style.width ) / 2;
00140       tempY -= parseInt( this.ui.getNode( selectedNode ).style.height ) / 2;
00141 
00142       // set the node position
00143       graph.getNode( selectedNode ).position['x']=tempX;
00144       graph.getNode( selectedNode ).position['y']=tempY;
00145 
00146       // if the timer is interupted, we still want the graph to move while we move the selected node around
00147       if ( this.timer['interupt'] ) {
00148         this.graph.applyForce();
00149       }
00150     }
00151   },
00152 
00153   // 
00154   addEdge: function( node1, node2, weight ) {
00155     if ( !weight ) { weight=48; }
00156     this.graph.addEdge( node1, node2, weight );
00157   },
00158 
00159   // 
00160   addNode: function( text, mass, originEdge, originEdgeWeight ) {
00161 
00162     var node;
00163     
00164     if (!mass) { mass=1; }
00165     node = graph.addNode( mass, text );
00166 
00167     var domNode = this.ui.getNode( node.id );
00168     var context = this;
00169 
00170     if ( originEdge ) { 
00171       if ( !originEdgeWeight ) { originEdgeWeight=92 }
00172       this.graph.addOriginEdge( node, originEdgeWeight );
00173       this.ui.addEdge( node, graph.getOrigin(), originEdgeWeight );
00174     }
00175 
00176     // add a mousedown event handler
00177     domNode.onmousedown=function(e) {
00178       return(
00179         context.selectNode(e, node.id)
00180       );
00181     };
00182 
00183     return node;
00184   }
00185 }
